version_description: - Bugs fixed
- Bugs fixed
- Bugs fixed

- fixed bug in the library display
- fixed crash when in random mode
- optimized general performances of the app

As the App Store does not let us answer your reviews from here, please write us directly at support@equalizerpl.us, our team is waiting for your feedback :)
If you enjoy the app, please take a moment to rate it on the store, it is really helpful for us!
Thanks in advance!

Equalizer+ V2 is finally here! Come discover the new version of your favorite music player!

- reworked interface: we sligthly improved the general design and ergonomic of the app to make it even more beautiful, and to make it easier for you to navigate in the app

- you now have a 7-band equalizer to go deeper in the customization of your tracks!

- fade mode: you can now choose between 6 predefined transitions, and choose in advance when to trigger your next track

- visualizers: watch your sound move to the beats of the music on three brand new visualizers

We received your feedback about the "clear data", this will be added in the next update! And stay tuned, there is more to come ;)

As the App Store does not let us answer your reviews from here, please write us directly at support@equalizerpl.us, our team is waiting for your feedback to improve the app!

If you enjoy the app, please take a moment to rate it on the store, ratings are really important for us :)

Thanks in advance!

Thanks for using Equalizer+! This version corrects the crash occuring when using the "shuffle all" button from an empty playlist. Sincere apologies for that. Also, we got your feedback about the "clear data", this will be added in the next update! And stay tuned, there is more to come ;)

And as a reminder, here are the new features of Equalizer+ 2.0:

- reworked interface: we sligthly improved the general design and ergonomic of the app to make it even more beautiful, and to make it easier for you to navigate in the app

- you now have a 7-band equalizer to go deeper in the customization of your tracks!

- fade mode: you can now choose between 6 predefined transitions, and choose in advance when to trigger your next track

- visualizers: watch your sound move to the beats of the music on three brand new visualizers

Stay tuned, there is more to come!

As the App Store does not let us answer your reviews from here, please write us directly at support@equalizerpl.us, our team is waiting for your feedback to improve the app!

If you enjoy the app, please take a moment to rate it on the store, ratings are really important for us :)

Thanks in advance!

Hey! Major update for you guys!

- Cloud access: you were a lot to ask us for that, so we did it, you can now access your Drive and Dropbox content from Equalizer+! Simply click on the little cloud located at the top left of the screen in the music library to connect to your account.

- Offline mode: download your cloud tracks to play them even when you don't have any internet connection.

- Flac format supported.

- Visualizers: discover the new awesome visual effects.

- Airplay compatibility: dedicated view for the spectral representation of the sound.

- Option to 'clear temporary data' is back

- iTunes shared folder access: transfer tracks between your computer to your device without having to synchronize with iTunes

- Unplugging your headphones will now automatically pause the music and cut the sound

- You can now see the value of the equalizer when changing it

Please send us your feedback on this version at support@equalizerpl.us so we can improve the app together!

If you enjoy the app, please take a moment to rate it on the store, ratings are really important for us :)

Thanks in advance!

Hey! Thanks for using Equalizer+!

In this version we have made improvements based on your feedback:

- You were a lot to ask for it, here it is: the landscape mode for iPad is now available!
- The Spectrum visualizer is now FREE.
- You can enjoy a player mode that displays the cover of the track currently played.
- A lot of other fixes have been made in order to provide a smoother experience.

Please send us your feedback on this version at support@equalizerpl.us so we can improve the app together!

If you enjoy the app, please take a moment to rate it on the store, ratings are really important for us :)

Thanks in advance!

Hey! This version includes minor bug fixes and improvements, like the return of the "status bar" on top of your screen so you can see the time or the battery level of your phone even when using Equalizer+.

Enjoying Equliaer+? Don't hesitate to check out the Premium app, it gives you access to all the features: Bass Booster, all visualizers, fade mode...etc. All that in a brand new awesome design!

Please send us your feedback on this version at support@equalizerpl.us so we can keep on improving the app together!

If you like Equalizer+, please take a moment to rate it on the store, ratings are really important for us :)

Hey guys! Here is what we worked on for that version:

- bug fix: no more ads for those of you who already have the Premium version! All our apologies for that, ads won't bother your experience anymore.

- playlists are now imported in alphabetical order

- headphones "play" control is back!

- you can now contact our support team directly from the settings of the app

Tell us what you think about this version at support@equalizerpl.us so we can keep on improving the app together!

If you enjoy Equalizer+, please take a moment to rate it on the store, ratings are really important for us.

Thanks in advance :)
